biotools.summary:
Inferring the three-dimensional structures of the X-chromosome during X-inactivation.

3D cubic lattice, 3D structure of the X-chromosome, Xist lncRNA, X-chromosome inactivation.

3D-XCI is a lattice-based 3D modeling tool for generating accurate and stable high-resolution 3D chromosome structures based on population Hi-C data

bioschemas.name: XCI
